# Tier 2 TOC.md Template

Use for medium documentation sets (30-100 files).

## Template

```markdown
# {name} Documentation Structure

## Directory Overview

| Directory | Purpose | Files |
|-----------|---------|-------|
| `contents/getting-started/` | Installation and setup | 5 |
| `contents/guides/` | How-to guides | 12 |
| `contents/api/` | API reference | 8 |

## getting-started/

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `installation.md` | How to install the package |
| `quickstart.md` | 5-minute getting started guide |

## guides/

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `authentication.md` | Setting up authentication |
| `deployment.md` | Deployment guide |

## api/

| File | Description |
|------|-------------|
| `client.md` | Client API reference |
| `server.md` | Server API reference |
```

## Guidelines

- Group files by directory
- Include directory overview table at top
- Each directory gets its own section
- Brief descriptions for each file
